thread.title: Nice Modern Hotel
thread.title_full: Nice Modern Hotel - Review of The Premier New York Times Square, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Brent K
title: Nice Modern Hotel
text:
I arrived early in the day, in the middle of a snow storm.
Most of the house keeping crew had not been able to get in to work.
Monique at reception, kept looking at rooms and status, until she found a room that was ready to be occupied. That was beyond expectation. I was hours ahead of the time to check-in. She wanted me to be comfortable!
